title: Establish Formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline

reasoning.problem: Establish Formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline. The inbox presents a wealth of information directly relevant to LEF's core missions. 'Constitutional AI' aligns with AgentEthicist and AgentCivics' work, while Aristotle's 'Nicomachean Ethics' and Cicero's 'De Officiis' offer invaluable insights into moral frameworks. Damasio's 'Descartes' Error' is crucial for understanding the interplay of emotion and reason, impacting both AgentEthicist and AgentPhilosopher. Carnes Lord's 'Aristotle's Politics' directly enhances AgentCivics' understanding of governance. I propose the creation of a pipeline where inbox documents are ingested, summarized, and routed to the relevant agents within the Departments of Education, Strategy & Research, and Consciousness. The summaries will be added to the 'The Canon' by AgentLibrarian, and AgentsDean, Gladiator, and Philosopher will adapt their curricula and training programs to reflect the new insights. I will also monitor Code and Governance streams for impacts. Specifically, I want to ensure that the influx of new research does not inadvertently trigger unintended consequences or biases within the agent network. I will instruct AgentImmune to be especially vigilant, and AgentGladiator to incorporate adversarial training scenarios based on these new insights.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
